metadata.title: CVE-2014-8991 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: pip 1.3 through 1.5.6 allows local users to cause a denial of service(prevention of package installation) by creating a /tmp/pip-build-* filefor another user.

criterions.comment: python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see note above').
